licenses.SWL_XCR_ENGINEERING_4H.descript: Allows to use the applications for 4h for engineering & development purposes.
ctrlX OS Host License - Standard Runtime
Allows to use ctrlX OS on this host.
ctrlX OS Host License - Standard Runtime (floating)
Allows to use ctrlX OS on this host.
ctrlX OS License - Floating License Server
Enables using the device as a (floating) license server.
ctrlX OS License - HSR / PRP redundant network protocols
Enables using redundant network protocols HSR and PRP.
ctrlX OS System License - Virtual Runtime (Floating/1Year)
Allows to use ctrlX OS on a virtual machine.
